column4: I have been task to write down a backup system plan, and in fact, for more than three hours now, I have just been thinking on where to start with no idea coming in my head, please who can help me with ideas, at least on how to start?
for the software, I will advice them to use backuppc
My point is that backup does not need to be a complicated thing.  Just make a copy of everything and put it on some other hdd.
